fields.label: WooCommerce Checkout Before Order Review Message
fields.name: woocommerce_checkout_before_order_review_message
fields.instructions: Add a note before the cart and payment fields on the WooCommerce checkout screen. This is useful to share messages like, "You'll have the option to disable any recurring payments listed below after completing your order."

fields.label: WooCommerce Memberships Thank You Message
fields.name: woocommerce_memberships_thank_you_message
fields.instructions: Using the filter woocommerce_memberships_thank_you_message, we are able to insert the template you select as a part of the message shown to the user immediately after checkout. (Requires the WooCommerce Memberships plugin to be installed.)

fields.label: Woocommerce Account Dashboard Message
fields.name: woocommerce_account_dashboard_message
fields.instructions: Hooks to etec_dashboard_message and displays the selected Elementor template on the user's WooCommerce Account Dashboard.

fields.label: Login Screen Message
fields.name: wplogin_message
fields.instructions: Assign an Elementor template to display above the login form.

fields.label: Disable WooCommerce Order Emails?
fields.name: disable_woocommerce_order_emails
fields.instructions: Select this option when you wish to stop WooCommerce from sending any order notification emails. This is useful when you are manually assigning memberships, and you don't want to send "New Order" notification emails.
fields.message: Switch on to disable WooCommerce Order Emails.

fields.label: Password Reset Email Message
fields.name: password_reset_message
fields.instructions:
This is the message sent when a password reset is requested for a user account. These tokens are available: {{sitename}}, {{reset_url}}, and {{username}}.

NOTE: Use the {{reset_url}} token as the "link" attribute value in a hyperlink (e.g. "Click here" to reset your password). When adding {{reset_url}} as the link value, be careful as WordPress likes to insert "http://" as a part of the attribute value, remove that if it does.
